column1: wanda corene mc. gehee| funeral services for wanda corene mc. gehee
column6: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. at meador funeral home chapel with ricky patterson officiating. interment will follow at collinsville cemetery. visitation will be held one hour prior to the service at 10:00 am at the funeral home. she died friday
column10: texas with her family by her side. she was born june 24
column11: 1927 to charles jacob carney and rebecca (gillum) carney in sherman
column12: texas. she married lawrence w. mc. gehee january 18
column13: 1946 in grayson county. she was a member of eastern star and was a lifelong member of richardson heights baptist church. quilting was her passion
column14: as well as making candy. she was an excellent gardener and enjoyed fishing. she was a loving wife
column15: mother and grandmother and will be missed by all who knew her. she is survived by her daughter
column18: lawrence dale mc. gehee and wife
column21: susan fletcher and neva evans; grandchildren
column24: josh mc. gehee and cori dai; great-grandkids
column29: van dai and ashlyn smallwood; step-grandchildren
column33: as well as numerous nieces and nephews. pallbearers will be ricky vannoy
column37: dicky rose and cary bryan. she was preceded in death by her husband
column38: lawrence w. mc. gehee and her parents
column41: faye ragsdale and florence culpepper and brother
column42: c. j. carney. upcoming events. visitationjun 22. 10:00 am meador funeral home401 hwy 377 north. whitesboro
